    All functions

    build_feature_NN()

    Build and compile a single Neural Network

    deviance()

    Deviance of the model

    diriv()

    Derivative of the link function

    installNeuralGAMDeps()

    Installs a custom conda environment with tensorflow and keras

    inv_link()

    Inverse of the link functions

    link()

    Link function

    NeuralGAM()

    Fit a NeuralGAM model

    plot(<NeuralGAM>)

    Visualization of NeuralGAM object

    predict(<NeuralGAM>)

    Produces predictions from a fitted NeuralGAM object

    print(<NeuralGAM>)

    Short NeuralGAM summary

    test

    Homoscedastic Uniform Gaussian synthetic test data.

    train

    Homoscedastic Uniform Gaussian synthetic training data.
